about_the_game:
Nakamon is a game that focuses on 3 things. The wonderful Nakamon creatures, an immersive and engaging world, and intense battles! 

This demo will feature the team based battling system where you pit your 5 Nakamon against your opponents 5 Nakamon to decide the victor!
